text: Bob Lutz and Stan Smith were the defending US Open men's doubles tennis champions but lost their title after a defeat in the third round. Fifth-seeded Ken Rosewall and Fred Stolle won the title by defeating unseeded Roy Emerson and Charlie Pasarell 2–6, 7–5, 13–11, 6–3 in the final. ==Seeds== ==Draw== ===Finals=== ===Top Half=== ====Section 1==== ====Section 2==== ===Bottom Half=== ====Section 3==== ====Section 4==== ==References== ==External links== * Association of Tennis professionals (ATP) results archive *1969 US Open – Men's draws and results at the International Tennis Federation Men's Doubles Category:US Open (tennis) by year – Men's Doubles
title: 1969 US Open – Men's Doubles
